title: You need help with attributes you little bitch?
description:
This is a list of all (working) embedded msg attributes to be used while editing.
Attributes that are grouped (i.e. group-[attr1/attr2/attr3] are separate attributes to be used as group-attr1, group-attr2, group-attr3, and so on.
For example, footer-[text/icon_url] is two separate attributes; footer-text and footer-icon_url.

fields.name: color
fields.value: The color of the message. Use hex or numbers.

fields.name: title-url
fields.value: URL to redirect to if title is clicked.

fields.name: author-[name/url/icon_url]
fields.value: Puts the author's name above the title. Adding a url makes it clickable and an icon_url includes the image at that url.

fields.name: footer-[text/icon_url]
fields.value: Puts the text/icon from url at the bottom of the message.

fields.name: image-[url/proxy_url/height/width]
fields.value: Puts the image/gif at a url in the body of the message. The height and width can also be specified.

fields.name: thumbnail-[url/proxy_url/height/width]
fields.value: Puts the image/gif at a URL in the thumbnail (top right) of a msg. The height and width can also be specified.

fields.name: video-[url/height/width]
fields.value: Puts the video in the body of the message. The height and width can also be specified.

fields.name: corn?set [event_name]
fields.value:
boost-embed - the embedded message to be sent whenever the server is boosted
max-boost - the embedded message to be sent whenever the server is boosted + maxed out
boost-msg - the regular message to be sent before the embedded message, allows for pinging

fields.name: fillable fields in corn?set [event_name]
fields.value:
custom values that will be filled out in a message when the event is triggered. Just insert {value_name} in the message. Run corn?load boost-example for an example
{uname} - ping a username
 {num_boosts} - current number of boosts in the server
{next_lvl} - number of boosts needed to get to the next level
